startUrls.title: Target URLs
startUrls.description: List of URLs to generate traffic for.

proxyCountryCode.title: Proxy Country Code
proxyCountryCode.description: Specify the two-letter country code for remote proxies, or 'LOCAL' for a local proxy.

waitOnPage.title: Wait Time on Page (seconds)
waitOnPage.description: Specify how long (in seconds) the actor should stay on each page.

enableCrawling.title: Enable Crawling
enableCrawling.description: Enable crawling of subpages and links within the target pages.

crawlingLinkSelector.title: Crawling Link Selector
crawlingLinkSelector.description: CSS selector for extracting links to crawl. This is used only when crawling is enabled.

blockUrlPatterns.title: Blocked URL Patterns
blockUrlPatterns.description: Patterns of URLs to block during traffic generation (e.g., '.jpg', '.css').

endAfterSeconds.title: Execution Duration (seconds)
endAfterSeconds.description: Maximum time (in seconds) for the actor to run before stopping.
